name: Project-TD
description:
Welcome to Project-TD!

Don't worry, it's just a working title to be replaced in the future.

Game is in early development stage but we would like to share with you our progress.

What is this game about? It's 3D Tower Defense with few features that makes it a bit different. You place foundations of tower, the proper tower is build by Build Drone. The drone seen in background is called DrOne. In future we want to make every map/level different, with original objectives.

At the moment game offers:

  • Simple main menu with changelogs, settings and level selection
  • Two maps with two modes each, Custom Mode - 20 test waves, Free Mode - Play until you lose
  • Two towers, Nail Tower - basic tower shooting rapidly with sharp nails, Burner Tower - shoots with hot beam and slowing enemies without shield
  • Build Drone feature - place foundations of towers and let the drone do the rest
  • RTS-like camera controller
  • You can upgrade towers and your drone with currency dropped by enemies
  • Pause menu in game with settings and restart level option
  • Time manipulation - speed up or slow down the game
  • Feature for testers - command console and debug window

Feel free to leave comment or message us, we apprecate every feedback.

Note that this is development build and the final product will be slightly different!
